snippet: Paul Lawrie of the winning European team said he was unhappy at the behavior of the gallery at the Ryder Cup in Medinah, Ill., last weekend.
abstract: Paul Lawrie of the winning European team says he was unhappy at the behavior of the gallery at the golf's Ryder Cup in Medinah, Ill.
lead_paragraph: Paul Lawrie of the winning European team said he was unhappy at the behavior of the gallery at the Ryder Cup in Medinah, Ill., last weekend.
